timeline_of_actual_events.1:15_PM: Officer Kane begins transport with Eddie Torres
timeline_of_actual_events.1:20_PM: Walsh plants evidence and calls for backup

key_timeline_facts.victim_investigation: Kane had been investigating Walsh for 3 months

key_timeline_facts.frame_job: Eddie unconscious for entire murder timeframe
